BIO

I have been in the field for about a year now and have enjoyed every eye opening minute of it. I specialize in HTML5, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, JQuery, and MySQL. From learning new skills to communicating with people, I am able to adapt to any situation and solve any problem.
